title: Powerful Skull in The Last Days - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Post-apocalyptic   Power Couple   Special Abilities   Transported to Another World   Zombies
author: Yangyang Feixue   残阳飞雪
description: Gao Shuo inadvertently encountered a strange encounter. At first, he used this skeleton as a combat partner to raise it. Until one day, this skeleton became a man, and Gao Shuo made a new decision. >
